coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the dress' inner lining informs you that it was made by 'C4MG1RL'.
coreAttributes.name: Trickster's tunic
coreAttributes.description: A knee-length tunic lined with dozens of hidden pockets. These concealed compartments are perfect for holding all manner of surprises or pilfered trinkets. Expertly designed so as not to impede the wearer's flexibility, this tunic is ideal for both dancing and fighting!

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unties)] the sash, before [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] tunic off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unties)] the sash, before [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tunic off over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unties)] the sash, before roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] tunic off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pulls)] the tunic down over [npc.her] head and torso, then [npc.verb(tie)] the sash tightly.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pulls)] the tunic down over [npc2.namePos] head and torso, then [npc.verb(ties)] the sash tightly.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pulls)] the tunic down over [npc2.namePos] head and torso, then [npc.verb(ties)] the sash tightly.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] tunic.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] tunic.
